description: Returns a job for a branch of an Amplify app.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for an Amplify app.

parameters.name: branchName
parameters.description: The name of the branch to use for the job.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The unique ID for the job.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the job.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the job.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID from a third-party repository provider for the job.

nested_items.name: commitMessage
nested_items.description: The commit message from a third-party repository provider for the job.

nested_items.name: commitTime
nested_items.description: The commit date and time for the job.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start date and time for the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status for the job.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end date and time for the job.

nested_items.name: jobType
nested_items.description: The type for the job. If the value is RELEASE, the job was manually released from its source by using the StartJob API. This value is available only for apps that are connected to a repository.

nested_items.name: sourceUrl
nested_items.description: The source URL for the files to deploy. The source URL can be either an HTTP GET URL that is publicly accessible and downloads a single .zip file, or an Amazon S3 bucket and prefix.

nested_items.name: sourceUrlType
nested_items.description: The type of source specified by the sourceURL. If the value is ZIP, the source is a .zip file. If the value is BUCKET_PREFIX, the source is an Amazon S3 bucket and prefix. If no value is specified, the default is ZIP.

nested_items.name: steps
nested_items.description: The execution steps for an execution job, for an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: stepName
nested_items.description: The name of the execution step.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the execution step.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the execution step.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the execution step.

nested_items.name: logUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to the logs for the execution step.

nested_items.name: artifactsUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to the build artifact for the execution step.

nested_items.name: testArtifactsUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to the test artifact for the execution step.

nested_items.name: testConfigUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to the test configuration for the execution step.

nested_items.name: screenshots
nested_items.description: The list of screenshot URLs for the execution step, if relevant.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current step status.

nested_items.name: context
nested_items.description: The context for the current step. Includes a build image if the step is build.
